title: Cathedral city
creator_credit: Don Chaffey, Frank Wells and Gaumont-British Instructional
brief_description: A celluloid pilgramage to the seat of the Anglican Church, the Church of Christ Cathedral in Canterbury. After a solemn survey of noteworthy cathedral features, the film explores the larger city in relation to the dominant architectural edifice.
